name: mastercard-backbank
description: mastercard worker for vaumoney of vaults.biz

scripts.course: npm run bcargo && npm run bwasm
scripts.bcargo: cd eglue && cargo install cargo-expand && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown -Zbuild-std
scripts.bcargo1: cd eglue && cargo install cargo-expand && rustup override set stable && cargo build && cargo expand --lib lib
scripts.bwasm: wasm-pack build eglue --target web --out-dir glue --out-name index
scripts.bwasm1: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-pack build eglue --target web --out-dir glue --out-name index
scripts.build4: cd src/source/eglue && cargo run start && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir glue --out-name index && cd ../../.. && rollup -c
scripts.build1: npx emsdk-checkout && npx emsdk install <version> && npx emsdk activate <version> && node run emcc
scripts.emcc: cd src/ && npx emsdk-run emscript.sh && cd .. && rollup -c

author: Nick <nmcarducci@gmail.com>
